languages.text: {n}Бровь торговки изгибается в непритворном изумлении, спустя несколько секунд она аккуратно отвечает, потупив взор.{/n} "У Вольного Торговца не бывает друзей, о шерин. Только слуги, для которых воля госпо{mf|дина|жи} — нерушимый закон. И партнеры, для которых благосклонность венценосн{mf|ого|ой} есть высшая награда за совместные труды. Ну что вы так смотрите? Разве есть друзья у Солнца, сияющего над {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}священной Террой{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Бровь торговки изгибается в непритворном изумлении, спустя несколько секунд она аккуратно отвечает, потупив взор.{/n} "У Вольного Торговца не бывает друзей, о шерин. Только слуги, для которых воля госпо{mf|дина|жи} — нерушимый закон. И партнеры, для которых благосклонность венценосн{mf|ого|ой} есть высшая награда за совместные труды. Ну что вы так смотрите? Разве есть друзья у Солнца, сияющего над {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}священной Террой{/g}?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"
languages.original_text: {n}Бровь торговки изгибается в непритворном изумлении, спустя несколько секунд она аккуратно отвечает, потупив взор.{/n} "У Вольного Торговца не бывает друзей, о шерин. Только слуги, для которых воля госпо{mf|дина|жи} — нерушимый закон. И партнеры, для которых благосклонность венценосн{mf|ого|ой} есть высшая награда за совместные труды. Ну что вы так смотрите? Разве есть друзья у Солнца, сияющего над {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}священной Террой{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with the reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants who treat the word of their {mf|master|mistress} as the supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sun that shines above the {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊扬起了眉毛，露出了真诚的惊讶。她花了好几秒钟才想到该说什么，当她开口的时候，她低下了头。{/n}“行商浪人是不能有朋友的，亲爱的。他们只有仆人，对仆人而言，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}的话语，就是最高的法律。行商浪人还可以有合作伙伴，对这些合作伙伴而言，来自授状主人的青睐，就是他们努力的最高回报。你为什么会把我看做你的朋友呢？太阳照耀着{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，太阳又有几位朋友呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊扬起了眉毛，露出了真诚的惊讶。她花了好几秒钟才想到该说什么，当她开口的时候，她低下了头。{/n}“行商浪人是不能有朋友的，亲爱的。他们只有仆人，对仆人而言，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}的话语，就是最高的法律。行商浪人还可以有合作伙伴，对这些合作伙伴而言，来自许可证主人的青睐，就是他们努力的最高回报。你为什么会把我看做你的朋友呢？太阳照耀着{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，太阳又有几位朋友呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon Holy Terra have?"

languages.text: {n}Jae alza una ceja verdaderamente sorprendida. Le lleva unos segundos encontrar una respuesta, y, cuando lo hace, baja la mirada.{/n} «Los Comerciantes Independientes no pueden tener amigos, shereen, solo sirvientes para los que las palabras de su am{mf|o|a} son la ley suprema. Y compañeros para quienes el favor del portador de la Patente es la mayor recompensa por sus esfuerzos. ¿Por qué me mira así? ¿Cuántos amigos tiene el Sol que ilumina la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae alza una ceja verdaderamente sorprendida. Le lleva unos segundos encontrar una respuesta, y, cuando lo hace, baja la mirada.{/n} «Los Comerciantes Independientes no pueden tener amigos, shereen, solo sirvientes para los que las palabras de su am{mf|o|a} son la ley suprema. Y compañeros para quienes el favor del portador de la Patente es la mayor recompensa por sus esfuerzos. ¿Por qué me mira así? ¿Cuántos amigos tiene el Sol que ilumina la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは驚いて眉をひそめた。返事をするのに数秒かかり、話すと同時に目を伏せた。{/n}「自由開拓者は友達を持てないのよ、シャリーン。そこにある関係は、主の言葉こそが最高の法であるしもべだけなの。そして令状の持ち主の好意が、互いの努力に対する最高の報酬となるパートナーなの。なぜそんな目であたしを見るの？{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}を照らす太陽には何人の友がいるのかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは驚いて眉をひそめた。返事をするのに数秒かかり、話すと同時に目を伏せた。{/n}「自由開拓者は友達を持てないのよ、シャリーン。そこにある関係は、主の言葉こそが最高の法であるしもべだけなの。そして令状の持ち主の好意が、互いの努力に対する最高の報酬となるパートナーなの。なぜそんな目であたしを見るの？{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}を照らす太陽には何人の友がいるのかしら？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hebt eine Augenbraue, ehrlich überrascht. Sie ringt einige Sekunden nach einer Antwort, uns als sie dann schließlich spricht, senkt sie den Blick.{/n} "Ein Freihändler kann keine Freunde haben, Shereen. Nur Diener, für die das Wort {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} oberstes Gesetz ist. Und Partner, für welche die Gunst {mf|des Inhabers|der Inhaberin} des Handelsbriefs die höchste Belohnung für ihre gemeinsamen Mühen darstellt. Warum seht Ihr mich so an? Wie viele Freunde hat die Sol, die auf das {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heilige Terra{/g} hinabscheint?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hebt eine Augenbraue, ehrlich überrascht. Sie ringt einige Sekunden nach einer Antwort, uns als sie dann schließlich spricht, senkt sie den Blick.{/n} "Ein Freihändler kann keine Freunde haben, Shereen. Nur Diener, für die das Wort {mf|ihres Herren|ihrer Herrin} oberstes Gesetz ist. Und Partner, für welche die Gunst {mf|des Inhabers|der Inhaberin} des Handelsbriefs die höchste Belohnung für ihre gemeinsamen Mühen darstellt. Warum seht Ihr mich so an? Wie viele Freunde hat die Sol, die auf das {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heilige Terra{/g} hinabscheint?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hausse un sourcil d'un air réellement surpris. Après avoir cherché ses mots pendant quelques secondes, elle répond en baissant les yeux.{/n} « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} ne peut pas avoir d'amis, shereen. Uniquement des serviteurs qui considèrent les paroles de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} comme la loi absolue, et des partenaires qui ne connaissent pas de plus belle récompense pour leurs efforts que la faveur {mf|du détenteur|de la détentrice} de la lettre de marque. Pourquoi me regardez-vous de la sorte ? Le Sol qui illumine la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g} a-t-il des amis ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hausse un sourcil d'un air réellement surpris. Après avoir cherché ses mots pendant quelques secondes, elle répond en baissant les yeux.{/n} « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} ne peut pas avoir d'amis, shereen. Uniquement des serviteurs qui considèrent les paroles de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} comme la loi absolue, et des partenaires qui ne connaissent pas de plus belle récompense pour leurs efforts que la faveur {mf|du détenteur|de la détentrice} de la lettre de marque. Pourquoi me regardez-vous de la sorte ? Le Sol qui illumine la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g} a-t-il des amis ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, samimi bir şaşkınlıkla tek kaşını kaldırıyor. Ne yanıt vereceğine karar vermek için birkaç saniye düşünmesi gerekiyor, konuşmaya başladığında da gözlerini yere indiriyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in arkadaşı olamaz şirinim. Efendilerinin sözünün onlar için kanun olduğu hizmetkârları olabilir. Bir de çabalarının karşılığı olarak Ruhsatname hamilinin lütfuna nail olmak isteyen ortakları. Bana neden öyle bakıyorsun? {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra'ya{/g} ışık saçan Güneş'in kaç arkadaşı vardır ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae raises an eyebrow in genuine surprise. It takes her a few seconds to come up with a reply, and when she does speak, she lowers her eyes.{/n} "A Rogue Trader cannot have friends, shereen. Only servants for whom the word of their {mf|master|mistress} is supreme law. And partners to whom the favour of the Warrant bearer is the highest reward for their mutual efforts. Why are you looking at me like that? How many friends does the Sol that shines down upon {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} have?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae samimi bir şaşkınlıkla tek kaşını kaldırıyor. Ne yanıt vereceğine karar vermek için birkaç saniye düşünmesi gerekiyor, konuşmaya başladığında da gözlerini yere indiriyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in arkadaşı olamaz şirinim. Efendilerinin sözünün onlar için kanun demek olduğu hizmetkârları olabilir yalnızca. Bir de çabalarının karşılığı olarak Ruhsatname hamilinin lütfuna nail olmak isteyen partnerler. Bana neden öyle bakıyorsun? {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra{/g}'ya ışık saçan Güneş'in kaç tane arkadaşı vardır ki?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
